summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the 10 foot alley extending from East Howell Street to East Denny Way, running back and between block 52, Yesler's 2nd Supplemental Addition to the City of Seattle, by paving with asphalt, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 50121, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
